summary: Don\'t you hate when your stuff vanishes from your room at the College? With this mod, at least it won\'t happen in Skyrim. Containers in your assigned Hall of Attainment room are now safe storage. And there\'s a bottle of Honningbrew Mead on the nightstand.
descriptionHtml:
Don\'t you hate when your stuff vanishes from your room at the College? With this mod, at least it won\'t happen in Skyrim. Containers in your assigned Hall of Attainment room are now safe storage. And there\'s a bottle of Honningbrew Mead on the nightstand.

With or without this mod, you can also find free safe storage at the Arch-Mage\'s Quarters, though that area isn\'t as easy to unlock for a new character. On the other hand, testing has shown that the barrels near Warmaiden\'s in Whiterun are not safe (contrary to popular belief).

One other small change made by this mod is that equipping the Saarthal Amulet will teach you the Turn Lesser Undead spell. This makes it impossible to become trapped forever in Saarthal if you\'re playing with a \"no starting spells\" mod.

This mod can also be found on Steam Workshop at [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=135459379]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=135459379[/url].

If you find any bugs or issues, please note them in the comments so I can promptly address them.
author: David Sid
